title: Textile
medium:
Medium: silk, paper with applied gold foil
Technique: compound plain herringbone with brocading
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 28.9 x 11.1 cm (11 3/4 x 4 3/8 in.)
description: Plain white fabric for top two-thirds. Bottom third has image of full frontal dragon head with green and gold striped background. Dragon woven in white, black, red, and blue silk with some metal wrapped paper threads.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile.
Medium: silk, paper with applied gold foil
Technique: compound plain herringbone with brocading. Gift of Miss Beatrice Kates. 1940-4-17.
